name: Diarrhea Protocol
question: Rx Diarrhea Protocol:||Syp Zincat / Syp Zincday:|    1 Tablespoon|    once daily for 14 days||BIFLOR / ENFLOR sachet:|    1 sachet in morning|    1 sachet in evening|    for 3 days||ORS sachet:|    1 sachet in 1 litre water|    one glass after every loose stool

name: Diarrhea Home Remedies
question: Rx Diarrhea Home Remedies:||    Drink boiled water only|    Eat only Khicrhi, Bananas and yogurt|    NO outside food|    Drink Black Tea with a pinch of salt
